programme.title: Wildest Latin America: Venezuela: The Treasure of El Dorado
programme.desc: Venezuela is famous for its lost worlds, its forbidding mountains, huge swamps, and impenetrable jungles, all seemingly cut off in space and time. Yet each is linked, by the mighty river: the Orinoco, the rumoured route to El Dorado, city of gold.

programme.title: Wildest Indochina: Cambodia: The Water Kingdom
programme.desc: Cambodia's wildlife and climate is ruled by the monsoon cycle. It is a wild land of extreme rains, raging rivers and flooding lakes that create great challenges for its animals, and a fine balance between seasons.

programme.title: Wildest Indochina: Southwest China: China's Secret Garden
programme.desc: Tucked away in China's southwest corner is a hidden oasis unlike any other. Snow-capped mountains, temperate valleys and tropical jungles are home to a spectacular array of wildlife.

programme.title: Wildest Islands: Caribbean: The Wild Side of Paradise
programme.desc: The Caribbean is a tropical paradise. From just a few meters wide, to hundreds of kilometers across, each of the over 7,000 islands are different, and each has its own unique wildlife.

programme.title: Wildest Islands: Zanzibar: Land of Giants
programme.desc: The Zanzibar Archipelago has been labeled the most exotic island chain in the world. Pristine sands and azure blue sea make it a much loved holiday destination. /The Caribbean is a tropical paradise. Each of the 7,000 islands are unique.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Ian attempts to make a mold of the entire car.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Ian runs into issues as he attempts some last minute changes.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage

programme.title: Full Custom Garage

programme.title: Full Custom Garage

programme.title: Full Custom Garage

programme.title: Andromeda: The Devil Take the Hindmost
programme.desc: Dylan and Rev Bem help a peaceful society to stand up to their would-be slavers. They have to be careful because if Dylan teaches them to kill, their kids will be born knowing it.

programme.title: Andromeda: The Honey Offering
programme.desc: Dylan attempts to bring peace to two different Nietzschean prides by escorting the princess of one to her arranged marriage to the prince of the other.

programme.title: Andromeda: Star-Crossed
programme.desc: Rommie's avatar falls in love with what turns out to be the avatar of a warship named Gabriel. Gabriel attempts to infect Rommie with a virus that broadcasts its plans to the warship.

programme.title: Andromeda: It Makes a Lovely Light
programme.desc: Beka takes the Andromeda to Tarn-Vedra, but extended time in the slipstream causes side effects. To combat them, Beka starts taking Flash and soon becomes addicted.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: An old memory from the Andromeda is accidentally activated, which sends her on a mission and leaves Dylan and the crew unable to override the command.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Dylan and Rommie must rescue Tyr, Harper and Rev from a Magog Worldship.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Out of the Dark
programme.desc: Described as a brutal execution, 46-year-old grandmother Chattrice Maihi-Carroll was found naked, stabbed to death in her New Zealand home in 2008. There were multiple suspects and everything seemed resolved following the arrest of a neighbour.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Into Thin Air
programme.desc: Jim Donnelly was a hard-working family man living a quiet life in suburban Auckland. For 20 years he’d worked as a scientist at the Glenbrook Steel Mill, south of Auckland. On the 21st of June 2004, he simply vanished into thin air.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Sensing Murder Insights - Special
programme.desc: Police detectives from around New Zealand reveal exciting new developments sparked by the Sensing Murder psychics in Series 1.

programme.title: Sensing Murder
programme.desc: 19-year-old Joan Wech left New Zealand for the bright lights of Sydney. But the first step on her overseas adventure would be her last. Was this a robbery gone wrong, a savage random attack or a revenge killing by a jealous ex-lover?

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Blood Sport: The Bondi Gay Murders
programme.desc: In the late 1980s and early 1990s a series of violent murders took place near Sydney’s famous Bondi Beach.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Contract to Kill / The Mornington Monster
programme.desc: Crime Investigation Australia has conducted a major investigation which reveals the inside story of the Megan Kalajzich murder and the extraordinary police investigation which will rock the Harbour City's elite to the core.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Hunt for a Killer: The Claremont Murders
programme.desc: This chilling CIA episode details the long and difficult investigation which began with the disappearance of 18-year-old secretary Sarah Spiers from a night club in the up-market Perth suburb of Claremont on Australia Day 1996.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Michael Kanaan: Shoot to Kill
programme.desc: Michael Kanaan was an angry young man in a hurry to make a name for himself in Sydney’s underworld. But his volatile temper and penchant for violence soon led him to kill three men before he was finally captured in a wild shootout with Sydney police.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Assassination of John Newman
programme.desc: John Paul Newman was a member of the New South Wales state parliament and a member of the seat of Cabramatta.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Into The Woods
programme.desc: Feral pigs have attacked Roy as well as sheep and cattle, so Claire, Becky and the Ryans go hunting. Meg feels awkward about having Terry over now that Jodi knows about them.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Haunted
programme.desc: The pain of dealing with loss grips the women of Drovers Run and each are forced to examine events - some old, some new - and find a way to deal with these emotional life-altering events.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: MEG struggles to cope with the reality of JODI’s coming of age and during the ensuing surprise party relationships are put to the test.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: TESS learns the impenetrable rules of what to say and not to say in the country and an innocent remark re opens a very ugly wound, which divides the Ryan brothers.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: CLAIRE and TESS save a neighbour from a burning shed, but all is not as it seems. His desperate act prompts CLAIRE to work harder than ever to keep Drovers Run and Tess reveals why she’s frightened of true love.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: Theft is on everyone’s mind and the women on Drover’s Run have their own style of justice.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Jane Riddell, chief operating officer of GoodLife Fitness, disguises herself as a Zumba-instructor trainee, a maintenance worker and a salesperson.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Stacey Mowbray, CEO of Canada’s largest specialty coffee company goes undercover and gets into the grind serving lattes to get an edge on customer service and revive her connection with frontline workers.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Sam Taylor, the President & CEO of Oriental Trading Company, the largest retailer of party supplies in the United States, is going undercover in hopes of finding that the company’s mission of “selling fun.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: The CEO of Canadian restaurant chain East Side Mario’s finds out what it’s really like for the Average Joe when he steps away from financial management to spend a week working undercover in his own kitchens

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Jose Mas, the CEO of MasTec, one of the largest builders of telecommunication and energy systems in North America, poses as a recently laid off high school basketball coach, getting a second chance at starting a new career.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Dina Dwyer-Owens, the Chairwoman and CEO of The Dwyer Group, which is the parent company to a collection of franchise brands specializing in home and vehicle maintenance, goes undercover posing as a contestant on a show called Keep Your Day Job.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Children in the Attic
programme.desc: One of the oldest yacht clubs in the USA is also one of the most haunted! A mother and her son are entangled in phenomena involving a frightening family from the past with a strange story to tell.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Paranormal Pirates
programme.desc: Fear is spreading at Fort Taber-Fort Rodmanthat a new \\"living history event\\" has stirred up frightening paranormal activity on the park grounds.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Fighting Spirit
programme.desc: TAPS has been called to investigate a historic armory. An upcoming renovation has those involved fearful the construction might provoke lingering spirits attached to artifacts with documented violent pasts.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Public Poltergeist Number 1
programme.desc: The historic Old Lake County Jail was once considered to be inescapable... until notorious gangster John Dillinger, escaped from it in 1934. Over 80 years later, aggressive prisoners are breaking free as sealed areas.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Angel of Death

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: No Luv Still
programme.desc: Dog is in search of a potentially dangerous fugitive, he's only 19 and charged with kidnapping and menacing. The case takes an unexpected turn when the Chapman clan ends up in a confrontation with the suspect's family.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Day of the Dog
programme.desc: Dog and the team are back in Colorado hunting bounties. Today's fugitive has a long rap sheet and a reputation for packing heat. With nothing but an address and phone number, the team heads out on the hunt.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Time to Cry
programme.desc: Kimo does a vanishing act for his day in court and now Dog and the posse have to find him. With precious few leads to follow Dog turns to the fugitive's on-again-off-again girlfriend, but she's initially reluctant to join the hunt.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Up on the Roof
programme.desc: Today, Dog and the family are back in Colorado and are about to make one of their most exciting captures ever. When the adrenaline-fueled arrest goes down, every family member will play a critical role.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Family Business
programme.desc: Dog and the Chapman clan start their hunt today with another well-established bail bonding family. As Dog's fame has grown, so have his responsibilities.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Felons Interrupted
programme.desc: Dog is confronted with two alleged felons in crisis. Family and friends of these bondees are convinced that they are getting into further trouble while awaiting trial, so Dog and the posse have to bring these men back to jail.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Bingo Star
programme.desc: Willie accompanies Kay to a local bingo tournament and gets seduced by the game, eventually embarrassing himself and Kay with his enthusiasm.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Sadie's Choice
programme.desc: Willie takes Sadie on a tour of a local college in hopes of convincing her to stay nearby after her impending high school graduation.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Children of the Cornbread
programme.desc: When the Robertson brothers debate which of their wives makes the best cornbread, it escalates into a full-on cornbread cook off. Meanwhile, when Jep, Martin, and Godwin play a practical joke on Uncle Si, it ends up being Si who has the last laugh.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Whole Lotta Bull
programme.desc: The guys enjoy a one-day rodeo fantasy camp where they learn the ins and outs of riding, roping and clowning.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Here Comes the Son
programme.desc: After leaving school to pursue music, Jase feels that Reed needs some structure in his life, so he hires him to take his place at Duck Commander.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Bro'd Trip
programme.desc: Jase accompanies Willie on a business trip to Arkansas to pitch a new product and has unorthodox sales strategies. Back in Monroe, Jep and Si have to track down an important item of Willie's that they accidentally shipped out.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Willie thinks his kids have been spending too much time on their phones and other devices so he initiates a "No-Tech Week," but when he has to participate too it ends up being harder than he thought. There's a lice outbreak at Duck Command.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: The West Monroe Wing
programme.desc: Willie and Jase run against each other to become president of their neighborhood HOA. Jep, Jess and Miss Kay work on a Duck Commander themed display for the local zoo.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Automation Frustration
programme.desc: Willie buys a 3D printer for the office that starts off as a fun distraction for the guys until it appears the printer could soon replace their jobs. Si is upset that Willie invested in the 3D printer and didn't give him a raise.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Razing the Snakes
programme.desc: Jase, Jep, Si and Cole try to fight back a growing population of cottonmouth snakes on Phil's property. Meanwhile, Willie uses his business expertise to help Rebecca improve her clothing store.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Uneasy Rider
programme.desc: Willie puts Little Will on a budget for his first car but it backfires when Will decides to get a motorcycle instead. Jase and the guys are inspired to design a product using zip lines that will revolutionize duck hunting.

programme.title: Cabin Truckers: Summertime Fun
programme.desc: Sue and Tom Marcoux live in the centre of Edmonton, Alberta and for the last 15 years have owned a scenic piece of land 169Km’s north on Baptiste Lake.

programme.title: Cabin Truckers: Tough Trek
programme.desc: Ron and Gail Murray love their idyllic rural retreat in Spiritwood, Saskatchewan and have called it home for most of their lives – along with their family of 4.

programme.title: Cabin Truckers: Lakeside Dream
programme.desc: "Melissa Torgeson, Peter Reid and their children have been living with her parents since their home was destroyed in a devastating fire. They’ve designed and bought a ready to move home and now it’s finished and ready to go.

programme.title: Cabin Truckers: Let's Save This Church
programme.desc: Lorainne Guckert, president of the Oyen Historical Society is rallying the small community of Oyen to save their beloved 100 year-old churches from demolition – needing to raise $15750.

programme.title: Cabin Truckers: We Want Our Party Barn Back
programme.desc: Pat and Sherry Ross are enlisting Wade and his team of heavy haulers to help get their daughter to move out! 23-year old Rebecca is a successful chef.

programme.title: Cabin Truckers: New Home, Big Problems
programme.desc: Sarah Wynker and her husband live in the small town of Vauxhall and want to help out their 25 year old son, Derek buy his first home. Sara works for Wades House Moving and by chance spotted the perfect bungalow for her son.

programme.title: Cabin Truckers: Get Us Out Of The City
programme.desc: Tyler and Amy Deck have enjoyed living in the city of Medicine Hat for the past few years but now find themselves wanting to move to the countryside and get back to their country roots.

programme.title: Cabin Truckers: Needed - More Room!
programme.desc: Ty and Melissa Corbiell and their two young sons are keeping it in the family and moving onto a 300 acre piece of land that has been in the family for generations.

programme.title: Cabin Truckers: Dinosaurs! Kids! Trees - Too Many Trees!
programme.desc: Tara Rosen and Brad Wilson run their own construction business while raising three young kids. They need help and are looking for the perfect house for Tara’s mom and dad so they can move to Drumheller and be closer to the kids.

programme.title: Cabin Truckers: Country Dream Home
programme.desc: Keith Chitwood is 27 and just graduated with an Agricultural Degree! Next up? Getting a home on a dream piece of land, with that, he’s heading back to the country and wants a house he can eventually start a family in.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Stir Crazy
programme.desc: America says that Nathaniel’s controlling ways has taken the relationship to the point of no return. Nathaniel says she’s always flirting with other men and even coming home with a hickies.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Thin Line Between Love and Hate
programme.desc: When the going got tough, Dermartess left his children and Rofiesha. Dermartess says Rofiesha forced him to leave 7 years ago. He still loves her and wants to see his children but believes she was too toxic. Can Judge Lynn Toler save this couple?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Out for Delivery
programme.desc: Jeanine says Marvin is cheating with co-workers and often meets up with his exes when they visit family in their hometown. He asserts she’s the one who cheated, not him, and she is so insecure she won’t stop bugging him about it.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Young Love
programme.desc: Anissa and Ma’lik have been together for 9 years and they have endured a lot of heartache due to Ma’lik’s cheating and dishonesty. Ma’lik says he’s not the same man he used to be and he’s trying to keep his family together..

programme.title: Divorce Court: House Car
programme.desc: Latoya Ward and Davarius Greaves are back for round two! Latoya wants Davarius to become a stay at home dad because he can’t keep a job. Davarius says Latoya sabotages any work he can get and goes out of her way to create hostile environments.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Back Seat of My Jeep
programme.desc: Bumping in the night in the back seat of his jeep has caused all our problems! Kelsey says Justin cheats, doesn’t pay bills and is always angry. Justin argues that she’s a liar and doesn’t help around the house ever.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Lonely Nights
programme.desc: Christina says Ramon is a cheater, runs from his financial responsibilities and their sex life is in the gutter. He’s tired of her enabling his family to the point, he takes refuge in hotel rooms to get a break from her.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Tapped Out
programme.desc: Lataisha says Chris smokes weed all day and can’t keep a job. Things seemed to be going fine until one day she walked downstairs in their home and realized that Chris moved out. Chris says he left because she is too aggressive.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Johnny on the Spot
programme.desc: Cornisha says Jawaun leaves for weeks at a time and returns broke and jobless. He says Cornisha is too bossy and picks fights causing him to blow up and take days away to cool down. Will they find a cooling point before their relationship melts down?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Crazy Sexy Cool
programme.desc: Stephen says Kisha is crazy and can snap in a split second, especially with his mom. He claims she accuses him of cheating, but Kisha is the one bit obsessed with one of her exes still.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Age Ain't Nothin but a Number
programme.desc: Kelley feels Keionte's childish behavior has her considering burning their marriage license. He claims that once they married, Mommie Dearest was born and no longer wants to be her business partner! Can they figure it out before it's too late?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Coming to America
programme.desc: Keith claims he is married to two other women overseas and plans to bring them over! Paw'lla says Keith is a fake pastor who doesn't know what he's talking about! Keith says he has a master plan for all of these wives!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Father-Hood
programme.desc: Before Tim heads out for a tough day of bounty hunting, he likes to get in a little quality time with his daughter, Summer Rain.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Cops and Criminals
programme.desc: After giving a rousing speech to an audience of enthusiastic grade-schoolers, Dog catches up with an old friend, Sheriff Tommy Cayetano, to talk business. Dog's got a tough fugitive, named Mia, to catch and Tommy is happy to lend a hand.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Cupid in Cuffs
programme.desc: It's the day before Valentine's Day and love is in the air at Da Kine Bail Bonds--but not for Tapi who has failed to appear in court on theft charges. Dog's plan is to have Leland knock on Tapi's door with a Valentine's gift to draw her out.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Bonds of Love
programme.desc: Dog and Beth are finally getting married! They've been together for more than ten years but Dog is determined, as he puts it, to "marry his common law wife the Christian way."

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: To Love and to Cherish
programme.desc: Dog and Beth are off to the Big Island for their wedding. They hope to relax for a few days but it turns out Leland has a fugitive he needs to catch and despite the time limit, neither Dog nor Beth can resist the opportunity to catch a fugitive.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Bustin' with Justin
programme.desc: Dog and the team must deal with misleading informants, belligerent boaters, and angry drunks when they go after Kimberly, a traffic offender with over 20 violations. And if that isn't enough, Dog has another problem - Duane Lee is sick.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Run Fugitive, Run
programme.desc: When the team hunts for Steven, a fugitive with a history of domestic abuse, they seek help from his girlfriend, who's been a victim of his abuse. Meanwhile, Beth trains for a 5K race to help raise awareness about domestic abuse.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Vegas or Bust
programme.desc: Dog is going to be the keynote speaker at the annual Profession Bail Agents convention in Las Vegas, but before he leaves he's got to clear two cases from his docket - Heidi and Stephanie.

programme.title: Run's House: Victoria Anne Simmons
programme.desc: Season three picks up with a very pregnant Justine and an anxious family awaiting the birth of their new child and sibling.

programme.title: Run's House: Hangin' with Run
programme.desc: Rev Run notices that Jojo isn't spending much time at home, instead, opting to hang out with his friends away from home.

programme.title: Run's House: Weight a Minute
programme.desc: Angela feels fat and actually thinks she needs to lose fifteen to twenty pounds. Vanessa thinks she's nuts for thinking she needs to lose that much weight and tells Mom and Dad.

programme.title: Run's House: Sneaker Pimps & Mini Moguls
programme.desc: Russy tells Run he wants to make more money by selling the toys he no longer uses.

programme.title: Run's House: To Catch a Thief
programme.desc: Vanessa and Angela are in desperate need of money to decorate their apartment.

programme.title: Run's House: Home Alone
programme.desc: With the release of Justine's children's book fast approaching, Run suggests a quiet, peaceful weekend away, to help her prepare for an upcoming book reading.

programme.title: Run's House: Run's Birthday
programme.desc: Run's birthday is coming up and he's conflicted about how to celebrate.

programme.title: Run's House: Family Album
programme.desc: Justine gets the performance bug and suggests laying down an R&B track in the studio.

programme.title: Run's House: Times are Changin'
programme.desc: Rev and Justine decide that they are finally ready to move forward with adopting a baby. While Justine worries about the details of the adoption, Jojo applies to college and is determined to gain acceptance.

programme.title: Run's House: Jo Jo's Graduation
programme.desc: It's summer time at the Simmons House. Rev has just purchased a BMW for Jojo's graduation. Diggy and Russy remind Run that they have made the honor roll at school and wonder if they will get a gift too.

programme.title: Run's House: Growing Up Is Hard To Do
programme.desc: Believing Diggy's fly wardrobe may have something to do with girls being interested in him, Russy raids Diggy's closet. Hearing the boys argue over clothes, Justine decides to get Russy some clothes of his own.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Haunted Sex Dungeon
programme.desc: Psychic/Medium Chip Coffey and Chad Calek join PRS for this unusual case of a sprawling mansion on Greyhaven Island near Detroit. Ken, the owner, hears voices and banging and it has him feeling both watched and cursed; a prisoner in his own home.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Death Room
programme.desc: PRS arrives in Ryan's hometown to help the new owner of an old southern plantation unearth its dark history.?A painful family secret reveals a tale of greed and neglect, and the team must help free its unwilling victim from her spiritual prison.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Supernatural Seduction
programme.desc: PRS investigates the Campbell House, where the Innkeeper and guests claim to have sexual encounters with a spirit who has deep ties to a family tragedy.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Requiem
programme.desc: A young woman named Kristy has been haunted in her own bedroom since she can remember. Now it's up to Ryan and the crew to help Kristy before she's overwhelmed by the entity.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Ladder
programme.desc: A large family in Shrewsbury, MA, has been living with a spirit for the last 40 years. To most of the siblings, the entity is menacing and evil, but Sandy seems to have a different connection.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Basement
programme.desc: A history of violence may connect the spiritual activity in Heidi's Ohio home to a long run of misery and cruelty.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Do Bad Things
programme.desc: After receiving a letter requesting PRS' help, Ryan and the team head to Ohio to help a grieving family and determine if the family's house contributed to the untimely death of a daughter.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Beer, Wine and Spirits
programme.desc: Brian's bar has a cranky customer who's got a bad habit of breaking wine glasses. Charlie has been dead since prohibition.

programme.title: Paranormal State: They Only Come Out at Night

programme.title: World's Greatest: Volcanic Islands
programme.desc: They've been worshiped and feared over the millennia. But in the wake of drama and destruction, the elements give rise to cultures and nations so beautiful that we've come to know them as the world's greatest volcanic islands.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Timeless Cities & Towns
programme.desc: These cities and towns are special places where the past coexists with the present, creating cultures totally unique to their people and their part of the world and adhering to ancient traditions and while introducing modern innovations.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Deserts
programme.desc: For all their reputation as inhospitable places, deserts are full of incredible plants and animals that have adapted to the climate. They are bursting with geological wonders that inspire and are home to some of the most life in the world.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Mega Cities
programme.desc: Mega Cities provide a bustling home to populations of over 10 million. Travel from the high-density living of Shanghai and Bangkok to the sprawling cities of Delhi and Mexico City, each the backdrop for dynamic cultures.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Coral Islands
programme.desc: The reef systems that gave rise to coral islands support the vast majority of marine species on our planet, but they are under threat. Explore the delicate balance between exploiting and preserving these extraordinary natural wonders.

programme.title: Arthur: Binky Barnes, Art Expert/Arthur's Lucky Pencil
programme.desc: It's a nightmare--Arthur and Buster have to work with Binky. On an art project! I mean, what does a bully like Binky know about art? Then, Arthur discovers the secret to success--a pencil that brings good luck to whoever possesses it.

programme.title: Arthur: D.W. Tale Spins/Prunella Gets It Twice
programme.desc: What happens when you combine Greek Mythology with D.W.'s imagination? Then, getting two Polly Locket dolls almost ruins Prunella's birthday party. That, and Francine's bad mood--why, she wouldn't even sing the Happy Birthday song!

programme.title: Arthur: When Duty Calls – Parts 1 & 2
programme.desc: Ladonna finds out the Army is transferring her dad to Oregon, and the whole Compson family is moving again. Fern and the others can tell Ladonna is upset, but don’t know how to help. What can they do to make the transition easier?

programme.title: Arthur: D.W.'s Deer Friend/Buster Hits the Books
programme.desc: It’s time to celebrate summer! Join Arthur as he takes a family vacation and visits Grandpa Dave’s farm. Then, Arthur, D.W. and Buster spend a few days at the beach where they discover the simple joys of building sandcastles!

programme.title: Arthur: When Carl Met George/D.W. Swims with the Fishes
programme.desc: George is excited about his new friend, Carl. Then George learns that Carl has Asperger's Syndrome – can they remain good friends? D.W. and James enter the pre-school swim meet and recruit their big siblings to coach them.

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur And The Big Riddle/Double Dare
programme.desc: Alex Trebek lends his voice as gameshow host Alex Lebek in this episode which poses the age-old riddle--is winning really everything? What if your friends dared you to skip homework--and then double dared you to skip school?

programme.title: Arthur: Just Desserts/The Big Dig
programme.desc: Arthur has a hard time resisting sweets, and one evening his overindulgence wins him an upset stomach and some 'Grimm' dreams. Arthur and D.W. loved it when Grandpa Dave came to visit--but now he only wants to sleep and play checkers.

programme.title: Arthur: D.W.'s Blankie/Arthur's Substitute Teacher Trouble
programme.desc: D.W. has one little secret--her blankie. When it mysteriously disappears, Arthur is pressed into service. Find that blankie--or else! Next, the unbelievable has happened--Mr. Ratburn has gotten sick. And who's going to be the substitute?

programme.title: Arthur: Carl's Concerto/Too Much of a Good Thing
programme.desc: Carl has agreed to play the accordion for George's puppet show. But his routines are getting in the way of rehearsals. Buster enlists Binky's help to keep him from gorging on delicious Tuvaluna cookies. Will Buster's self-control crumble?

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: The Battle of Malta (June 1941)
programme.desc: In 1941, Mussolini desperately wants to wrest the tiny island of Malta from the British for control of the Mediterranean. When his inadequate air force fails to bomb the Maltese into submission, Hitler's Luftwaffe joins the campaign.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: The Fall of Singapore (October 1941)
programme.desc: Before the sneak attack on Pearl Harbor, the Japanese initiate the Pacific War by firing on the British in Malaya. Their route to the rubber-rich nation takes them into Singapore, the World's most armed fortress.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: Pearl Harbor (December 7, 1941)
programme.desc: During a two-hour surprise attack on the American Pacific fleet anchored at Pearl Harbor, Japanese navy pilots score a near-complete victory.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: Fall of the Philippines
programme.desc: Examining the Japanese invasion of the Philippines in December 1941.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: The Battle of Midway (June 2, 1942)
programme.desc: Only one isolated atoll prevents an enemy invasion of Hawaii. Midway Island is where the Japanese fleet converges on a tiny American base with a massive strafing and bombing attack.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: The Solomon Islands (July 1942)
programme.desc: For the first time since Americans entered the war, Marines face Japanese infantrymen at Guadal Canal. In the jungles, two powerful armies clash in a six month battle that claims nearly 30,000 lives.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: Battle of Dieppe
programme.desc: The Allies launch an ill-fated attack on the German-occupied port of Dieppe, France.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: Battle of Stalingrad
programme.desc: German forces encounter Russian resistance.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: El Alamein
programme.desc: Erwin Rommel battles Allied forces in North Africa in 1942.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: North Africa (November 1942)
programme.desc: In the North African desert in 1942, American fighting forces encounter the dreaded Rommel for the first time to stop the German war machine.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Whitney & Bre
programme.desc: Whitney met Brenell on a LGBT website four years ago and is head-over-heels in love. Brenell refuses to video chat with her, and Whitney is desperate to know why. Nev and Max investigate. (S4, ep7)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: When Sandra learns that her granddaughter, Yasmine, sent money to an online boyfriend, she asks Nev and Max for help. And they soon discover there's much more that Yasmine has been hiding. (S6, ep7)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Aaliyah & Alicia
programme.desc: Aaliyah has been able to share her life struggles with Alicia. However, despite living only 70 blocks away, Alicia refuses to meet her as she hasn't come out to her friends and family yet.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Alante has been planning a life with his online love. She's perfect but her disappearances have Alante worried. Nev and Max help uncover a truth that affects Alante's entire town. (S6, ep2)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Alayah & Tommy
programme.desc: Alayah and Tommy started messaging on a live streaming platform. Alayah thinks he could be the one, but when they try and meet, he keeps cancelling. Nella and Oobah help to track him down. (S2, ep8)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Alex & Matt
programme.desc: Alex has been chatting to Matt for a year and thinks he could be the one. But after several failed attempts to meet, Alex wants Julie and Oobah to track him down. (S1, ep5)

programme.title: 48 Hours: Amanda Knox: The Untold Story
programme.desc: The story of Amanda Knox, an American exchange student who was convicted, along with her Italian boyfriend, Raffaelle Sollecito, of murdering Amanda’s British roommate, Meredith Kercher in 2007.

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Killer Next Door
programme.desc: Donald Miller, was sentenced to 30 to 50 years for rape and attempted murder but was suspected in four other murders. In an unusual plea bargain, Miller agreed to work with police trying to recover his memories of other murders.

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Blue River Murder
programme.desc: A report on the investigation into the 2010 death of Stephanie Roller, a Colorado mother of three who allegedly went for a walk during a blizzard and was later found dead in a nearby river.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: A missing woman is found dead in Texas; interviews with her family, friends, investigators, and boyfriend.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Love, Hate & Obsession
programme.desc: In the investigation of the murder of a one-time millionaire, both his ex-wife and his son are suspects.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Last Chance for Justice
programme.desc: A report on the 1980 murder of Marilyn McIntyre, who was found dead in her home. Her husband, Lane, had returned home from work that morning and found her body. As police checked into his alibi, he named his friend Curt Forbes as a potential suspect.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Test Case
programme.desc: The Impossible Missions Force must end the murderous career of a bacteriologist working for the enemy, who has succeeded in developing a mutant strain of a deadly bacteria which could be used as a practical battlefield weapon.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The System
programme.desc: The Impossible Missions Force led by Jim Phelps (Peter Graves) sets out to persuade the trusted henchman of a crime syndicate leader to testify against his boss.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Glass Cage
programme.desc: An electronically guarded prison confronts the Impossible Missions Force when it tries to free a political prisoner (Richard Garland) from an escape-proof glass cell.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: Live Bait
programme.desc: The Impossible Missions Force invades the intricate world of spies to protect an American double agent and comes up against a human time bomb.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: Doomsday
programme.desc: When an unscrupulous manufacturer risks World War III by offering a hydrogen bomb for sale, the Impossible Missions Force enters the bidding with a dangerous plan to keep the weapon out of enemy hands.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: All About Me
programme.desc: Baby Bop and BJ have fun playing ball in the park. Barney helps them learn that trying something new can also be fun. Baby Bop prepares a special picnic for BJ, but much to his surprise, it consists mostly of her favorite foods.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Easy as ABC
programme.desc: When Baby Bop uses the caboose mailbox to deliver a special invitation to her tea party, she discovers that no one can read her handwriting. Barney and his friends find creative ways to help her learn her ABCs!

programme.title: Barney and Friends: My Family and Me
programme.desc: The children are invited to a family picnic in the park, but don't know who invited them. The invitations instruct them to bring a family treasure, so each child has something special with them. Barney helps lead a discussion about families.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Baby Bop meets a new girl named Jill who doesn’t want to join the fun.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: BJ and Baby Bop get into a debate of which is better: the sun or the wind. Rachel learns that the park is not only a place to come and play but it's also the home of many different creatures.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: A creepy spider inspires Barney to tell the story of “The Reluctant Dragon.”

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: When several sports balls suddenly disappear without a trace, it’s detective BJ to the rescue as he dons trenchcoat and fedora.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Baby Bop can't find anybody to play with her. When the others see her feeling sad, they decide to play whatever she wants to play. The dinos and kids are planning a camp-out at the park.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Gone in 20 Seconds
programme.desc: Ton and Allen get taken down by their fiercest opponent, CJ, but a twist of fate keeps the guys in the game. They uncover a Geiger counter and NASCAR impact wrenches, while their accountant delivers some shocking news.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Haff-Inated
programme.desc: Allen's off his game without his morning coffee, but some fun items help him re-energize. The guys find a wrestling ring, and when Allen uncovers vintage animatronics, they remind him of his days as a theme park boat captain.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Cold Hard Cash
programme.desc: Ton and Allen go North to Alaska and get a cold reception from the local auctioneer. They find two enormous seaplane pontoons and a pair of Smith & Wesson revolvers, including the most powerful production handgun in the world!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Sink or Swim
programme.desc: 1905 Hand-crank Thomas Edison gramophone with cylindrical records; a discontinued Addictor 190 Mini Boat; a rare 1897 Regina music box.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Rock and Roll
programme.desc: An auction in Whittier gets ugly when a buyer named Big Dave tries to take it all. After some tough losses, the guys win a state of the art food truck and an off-road rock crawler with dangerous consequences.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Hula Moola
programme.desc: Ton and Allen jet to the Hawaiian islands where they're joined by a feisty new female assistant! The team uncovers a pair of James Bond-style gadgets designed for high-speed underwater travel and a vintage sled.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Auction Hunters, Ink.
programme.desc: Autographed 1960s Bob Shaw Swing Gate tattoo machine; Terry Ives competition 22hp chainsaw; six foot chainsaw-carved cedar bear.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Sin City Shootout
programme.desc: 1953 Chevy-inspired bumper car; scores of M16 30-round magazines; reproduction 1940s boardwalk photobooth; aerosol-powered spud gun potato launchers.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Fall Guys
programme.desc: The pressures of running a shop are taking a toll on Ton and Allen and not even the discovery of a stunt-man's fall bag can ease the tension. When things get heated, Ton abandons the partnership and leaves town.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Chicago Grand Slam
programme.desc: 1984 Yamaha SS440 Snowmobile that introduced the revolutionary shock absorber suspension; rare autographed 1920s baseball glove; mint Hank Aaron signed baseball; authentic 1950s Robby the Robot collector toy.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Betsy's Last Stand
programme.desc: With their beloved bread truck on life support, Ton and Allen head to an auction to help save her. Will an industrial grinder and a classic Chevy be enough to mend Betsy, or will the guys be forced to say goodbye for good?

programme.title: Teen Mom: Not Again
programme.desc: Teen Mom returns for another dramatic and emotional series as we follow the unpredictable lives of the four original teenagers. Expect trouble with the police, and battles in court.

programme.title: Teen Mom: Should I Stay or Should I Go?
programme.desc: Catelynn gets caught in a lie and faces losing her boyfriend Tyler. Amber's boyfriend Gary tells her he might leave her for another girl, and Maci tries to move into a shared house.

programme.title: Teen Mom: Valentine's Day
programme.desc: Maci goes clubbing with friends for Valentine's Day. A crying baby and unrealistic expectations ruin Amber and Gary's romantic night. Farrah shares a big secret about her baby's dad.

programme.title: Teen Mom: Spring Break
programme.desc: Amber and Gary's vacation shows there's no such thing as spring break once you have a baby. Maci butts heads with Ryan over his new girlfriend. Tyler is still angry with Catelynn.

programme.title: Teen Mom: Secrets & Lies
programme.desc: Gary dresses up as a bunny at Easter but a big fight makes Amber question their engagement. Maci's new boyfriend meets her son for the first time. Farrah falls victim to a scam.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: A riot threatens to break out at a Manhattan precinct.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: Adam witnesses a murder online while participating in a webchat with a stranger.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: A decomposed body is found on a rooftop.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: A sniper begins a campaign of random shootings in the city.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: Mac continues the investigation into the murder of Chief Carver's sister.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: A department store manager is found dead inside his store's holiday window display,

programme.title: CSI: Miami: Kill Clause
programme.desc: The CSIs suspect a company is killing its employees in order to profit.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A body falls from the sky and the team discover it is from a commercial space flight.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Ninety Degrees

programme.title: Rookie Blue: 74 Epiphanies

programme.title: Kung Fu Sock
programme.desc: Tee Zeng is going to Rainbow Cat Park with her best friend, Min. Tee Zeng plans to ask Min to join them in finding and fighting Kwei, but Kung Fu Sock does not approve of the plan.

programme.desc: Tee Zeng and Min plan to go to a seafood restaurant but can't find a coupon. Instead, they find an old fishing pole. To get some free seafood, Tee Zeng decides that they should go on a fishing trip.

programme.title: Kung Fu Sock
programme.desc: Min has a nice comb that's made of precious old wood, but Tee Zeng accidently breaks it in two. Kung Fu Sock tells Tee Zeng to come clean, but she worries it might hurt their friendship, so she decides to hide it from Min and make her a new comb.

programme.title: Kung Fu Sock

programme.title: Kung Fu Sock
programme.desc: Kung Fu Sock is stressed out by the mission to find Kwei and has nightmares every day. A worried Tee Zeng replaces the scroll with a fake one that doesn't light up and plans a day of fun for Kung Fu Sock to take his mind off things.

programme.title: Kung Fu Sock

programme.title: Kung Fu Sock

programme.title: Kung Fu Sock

programme.desc: Tee Zeng's classmate Gossip Boy is an enthusiast of magic tricks, but he's never successfully performed any in front of his classmates. At a magic shop, he buys a wand that's said to have belonged to Mr Magic, a legendary magician.

programme.desc: In order to detect abnormal energy, Hiro Hao invents a searching device. Following the detector, Hiro Hao goes to the bun house and Tee Zeng's family's laundry store, but can't figure out where the abnormal energy is.

programme.desc: Manipulens comes up with many traps to drive a wedge between Kung Fu Girl and Sword Hero. After starting another quarrel, Manipulens hides himself in the crowd and tries to provoke Sword Hero.

programme.title: Bob the Builder

programme.desc: Bob is building a water feature in Mrs Potts’ garden, while Wendy and Scoop are demolishing a dry stone wall. Bob and the Machines are greatly amused by the statue Mrs Potts has chosen for her centrepiece.

programme.title: Bob the Builder

programme.title: Bob the Builder

programme.title: Bob the Builder

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: A Stitch in Time
programme.desc: An exhibition for the first arrival of the Taelons showcases different artifacts. An artifact causes Liam to travel to an alternate time. Zo'or questions how Da'an was able to rejoin the Commonality.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Dimensions
programme.desc: Liam and Augur are in a Taelon shuttle craft, when something happens they get thrown into a parallel universe. They discover that humanity is at war with the Taelons.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Moonscape
programme.desc: Augur is forced to take part in a Taelon experiment. Da'an and Liam try to convince Zo'or that altering minds and implanting humans to make them aggressive to fight the Jaridians is not the correct path. Maiya makes contact with Sandoval.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: The Sleepers
programme.desc: A Jaridian probe lands on Earth and begins sucking energy from the Comonality. The Taelons use humans in a near-death state to keep their connection while Lili and Sandoval try to find out what is draining the energy.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Fissures
programme.desc: When large scale blackouts begin to occur in cities with portals, Taelon technology is blamed. Augur and Liam investigate the death of a portal worker by a strange creature that feeds on energy and is particularly attracted to the Taelons.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Redemption
programme.desc: Siobhan falls while rock climbing. As the others search for her, she dreams that she is on trial for supporting the Taelons. Zo'or questions whether Sandoval's CVI imperative to serve the Taelons has broken down as others are experiencing.

programme.title: The Lost World: The Beast Within
programme.desc: Malone goes after a healer that's been filled with the spirit of a demon in exchange for safe release from the village. The girls must set their differences aside and learn to trust each other.

programme.title: The Lost World: Creatures of the Dark
programme.desc: Challenger tries to convince an underground civilization of the dangers of an active volcano ready to blow. In the meantime Veronica, Roxton, and Summerlee try to outrun the Vantu.

programme.title: The Lost World: Tribute
programme.desc: Challenger, Roxton, and Veronica teach the Tintas how to retaliate against the Hikari so that they may be independent. Meanwhile Marguerite, Summerlee, and Malone help a WWI pilot fix his plane.

programme.title: The Lost World: Absolute Power
programme.desc: A powerful light ray from an ancient temple knocks Professor Challenger unconscious. As the explorers try and save him, he occupies an alternate reality in his mind where he has godlike powers.

programme.title: The Lost World: Camelot
programme.desc: In the process of trying to save Marguerite from being betrothed to a teenage king, Malone must face a T-Rex with only a sword and Roxton must joust against Vordred.

programme.title: The Lost World: Unnatural Selection
programme.desc: Challenger comes face to face with an old friend from England, Dr. William Hargrove. Summerlee, Malone, and Marguerite agree to help the Queen of the nymphs and fairies break a curse.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Phillip Serrell has taken a commanding lead but Jonathan Pratt is determined to catch him up as they go into day four of their trip. Today they start buying in Gainsborough and end up in Lincoln for the auction showdown.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Anita Manning and James Lewis take to the road as they go head-to-head to try and make the most profit from buying and selling antiques. They start their journey in Pateley Bridge, Yorkshire, and end up at the auction in Grimsby.

programme.title: Catfish UK: Levi & Will
programme.desc: Levi is convinced Will is his dream man and broke up with his boyfriend so they could be together. After always cancelling on Levi, Oobah and Nella suspect something fishy is going on. (S2, ep2)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Jordan & Austin
programme.desc: After two years of chatting, Jordan believes Austin is the one. But every time they arrange to meet, Austin cancels. Can Julie and Oobah finally bring them together? (S1, ep9)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Leanne & Jamie
programme.desc: Leanne is desperate to find out if online love Jamie is her Mr Right. After cancelling on her numerous times, Leanne wants Oobah and Nella to investigate and finally bring them face to face. (S2, ep3)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Cole, Abbie & The Fanpage
programme.desc: Cole and Abbie keep being sent anonymous creepy gifts to their home and their relationship is now at breaking point. Julie and Oobah head to Scotland to try and help save their marriage. (S1, ep4)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Emma & Harlin
programme.desc: Julie and Oobah uncover more than they were expecting, as their search to help Emma find her online love Harlin takes a sinister turn. (S1, ep1)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Alex & Matt
programme.desc: Alex has been chatting to Matt for a year and thinks he could be the one. But after several failed attempts to meet, Alex wants Julie and Oobah to track him down. (S1, ep5)

programme.title: 48 Hours: Justice For Sheila?
programme.desc: This report offers fresh insight into the brutal murder of Sheila Bellush, a Sarasota, Florida mother of quadruplets who was killed in front of her children.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Power and Passion
programme.desc: 48 Hours probes case of Alabama politician Stephen Nodine -- accused in the 2010 shooting death of his mistress, Angel Downs.

programme.title: 48 Hours: While Innocents Slept
programme.desc: A report based on the murder case involving the deaths of two infants which were originally attributed to SIDS (Sudden Infant Death Syndrome).

programme.title: 48 Hours: Live To Tell: River's Edge
programme.desc: On January 8, 2000, college students Danielle Keener and Dan Zapp were on a date, walking along a river’s edge outside York, Pennsylvania, when they were kidnapped at gunpoint by a man in a pick-up truck.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Guilty Until Proven Innocent
programme.desc: Two men convicted for a brutal rape they say they didn’t commit, and DNA evidence backs them up. How did a law professor, her students and new DNA technology play a part in the case?

programme.title: 48 Hours: Pain and Gain
programme.desc: A report about the crimes of the Sun Gym gang, a group of Miami, Florida drifters, petty thieves, and bodybuilders who kidnapped and killed wealthy people to fuel their lifestyle.
